references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
example: a(6)=23 because the divisors of 6 are: 1, 2, 3 and 6; and prime(1) + prime(2) + prime(3) + prime(6) = 2 + 3 + 5 + 13 = 23.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, Prime]; Array[a, 60] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 01 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 08 2001
